body:
Comment 1 by **cornelius.howl**: 
I found CGO_ENABLED option, does this make sense?

CGO_ENABLED=0 GOOS=linux GOARCH=amd64 go build -x

WORK=/var/folders/j7/xdvdxd1s7w3gv8ztrp3qnj_r0000gn/T/go-build020258508
mkdir -p $WORK/_/Users/c9s/src/go/goweb/goweb/_obj/
cd /Users/c9s/src/go/goweb/goweb
/usr/local/go/pkg/tool/darwin_amd64/6g -o
$WORK/_/Users/c9s/src/go/goweb/goweb/_obj/_go_.6 -p _/Users/c9s/src/go/goweb/goweb -D
_/Users/c9s/src/go/goweb/goweb -I $WORK ./constants.go ./context.go ./controller.go
./cookies.go ./decoders.go ./form_decode.go ./formatters.go ./http_handler.go
./parameter_key_map.go ./parameter_value_map.go ./path_parsing.go ./requests.go
./rest_controller.go ./route.go ./route_manager.go ./route_matching.go ./security.go
./shortcut_funcs.go ./standard_response.go
/usr/local/go/pkg/tool/darwin_amd64/pack grcP $WORK
$WORK/_/Users/c9s/src/go/goweb/goweb.a $WORK/_/Users/c9s/src/go/goweb/goweb/_obj/_go_.6
